```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
art<- art %>%
 mutate(sold = ifelse(is.na(Hammerprice), 0,1))

art$Theme <- relevel(factor(art$Theme), ref = "L")
art$Type <- relevel(factor(art$Type), ref = "oil")
art$House <- relevel(factor(art$House), ref = "A")

art <- art %>%
  mutate(surface = SizeLengthhÃ¶jd * SizeWidthbredd) %>%
  mutate(surface_squared = surface^2)

unique(art$Month)

art$Month<- substr(art$Event, 5,6)
art$December2remember <- ifelse(art$Month == "12", 1,0)
```


```{r}
probit_out <- glm(sold~Unsigned1+Theme+Type+ House+surface+surface_squared + December2remember+Artist+Year, data = art, family = binomial(link = "probit"))
summary(probit_out)
```

```{r}
mr<- invMillsRatio(x = probit_out)
IMR <- mr$IMR1
```

```{r}
Hammer_lm<- lm(log(Hammerprice)~Unsigned1+Theme+Type+ House+surface+surface_squared + December2remember+Artist+Year+IMR, data = art)

summary(Hammer_lm)
```
